ResearchProjectDef.label: Accelerated Cellular Regeneration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of MedPods, advanced hospital beds capable of automatically treating a wide range of diseases and injuries by electrically stimulating and guiding the repair processes of living cells.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You now have the technology to build MedPod beds - but each MedPod requires a special Isolinear Processor component. You can collect Isolinear Processors several ways:

 -Orbital or caravan exotic goods traders sell Isolinear Processors. Invite or wait for them.
 -Some quests are rewarded with Isolinear Processors.
 -Disassemble 4 Components to extract a Isolinear Processor.
